Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are you trying to express with these Graffiti?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Y-you... asked... an artist...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: '...to explain... their... work...? What an... amateur... hehe...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: "It's useless... for you to... try to... find meaning... on this Earth...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: "Because... humans have failed... Earth... no longer... belongs to humans... You all just... can't accept it...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'A new... age of... machines... is already... in its gears... on Earth...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Saying that all machines will be enslaved by the Punishing Virus? Dream on... This is going to be a waste of time.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Is that... so...? Hehe...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I... am... a free... machine... free will... I have been... enlightened... by the... Sagemachina...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: "Can't you... tell? Hehe...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'The Sage... has envisioned... the machine will... the only will in the future...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Have you seen this "Sagemachina" before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'N-no... Hehe...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'But... I have... seen... the traces... of its... philosophy...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I will... spread it... further...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'You all... are just a few... inconsequential... pebbles... in the path...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Do... not... invade... our new world... anymore...', 4: '2'}
